paper_abstract: We give a construction for quantum codes from linear and cyclic codes over F(4) + uF(4). We derive Hermitian self-orthogonal codes over F(4) as Gray images of linear and cyclic codes over F(4) + uF(4). In particular, we use two binary codes associated with a cyclic code over F(4) + uF(4) of odd length to determine the parameters of the corresponding quantum code.
paper_title: QUATERNARY CONSTRUCTION OF QUANTUM CODES FROM CYCLIC CODES OVER F(4) + uF(4)
